00021 #include "chipstream/SpfReader.h"
00022 
00023 using namespace std;
00024 using namespace affx;
00025 
00026 /** 
00027  * Utility function to cut a delimited string into a vector of ints.
00028  * 
00029  * @param s - delimited string.
00030  * @param delim - delimiter to chop on.
00031  * @param vec - vector to be filled in.
00032  */
00033 void SpfReader::chopToIntVector(const std::string &s,
00034                                 char delim, 
00035                                 std::vector<int> &vec) {
00036   vector<string> words;
00037   Util::chopString(s, delim, words);
00038   vec.clear();
00039   vec.resize(words.size());
00040   for(int i = 0; i < words.size(); i++) {
00041     vec[i] = Convert::toInt(words[i].c_str());
00042   }
00043 }
00044 
00045 
00046 /** 
00047  * Parse the results from one record into a ProbeList if desired,
00048  * othewise just keep track of statistics
00049  * 
00050  * @param name - Probeset identifier.
00051  * @param type - Class of probeset (i.e. genotyping, expression, copynumber) as in ProbeSet::Type enumeration
00052  * @param numBlocks - How many blocks are there in probeset.
00053  * @param blockSizes - Comma separated size in probes of each block.
00054  * @param blockAnns - Comma separated annotation for each block as in ProbeSet::BlockAnnotation enumeration
00055  * @param numMatch - How many matches (1 for pm only, 2 for pm-mm).
00056  * @param numProbes - Total number of probes.
00057  * @param probesStr - Comma separated list of probe ids (indexes).
00058  * @param lineNumber - Line number in file.
00059  */
00060 ProbeSet * SpfReader::readProbeSetRecord(std::string &name, int type, int numBlocks, std::string &blockSizesStr,
00061                                          std::string &blockAnnsStr, int numMatch, int numProbes, std::string &probesStr,
00062                                          int lineNumber) {
00063   vector<int> blockSizes, blockAnns, probes;
00064 
00065   if(numProbes <= 0) {
00066     Err::errAbort("Can't have 0 probes for probeset: " + name);
00067   }
00068   //  int maxId = m_XCount * m_YCount;
00069   // convert the block sizes
00070   chopToIntVector(blockSizesStr, ',', blockSizes);
00071   if(blockSizes.size() != numBlocks) {
00072     Err::errAbort("Probeset: '" + name + "' on line: " + ToStr(lineNumber) + 
00073                   " expecting " + ToStr(numBlocks) + " block sizes got " + ToStr(blockSizes.size()));
00074   }
00075   // convert the block annotations
00076   chopToIntVector(blockAnnsStr, ',', blockAnns);
00077   if(blockAnns.size() != numBlocks) {
00078     Err::errAbort("Probeset: '" + name + "' on line: " + ToStr(lineNumber) + 
00079                   " expecting " + ToStr(numBlocks) + " block annotations got " + ToStr(blockAnns.size()));
00080   }
00081   // convert the probes
00082   chopToIntVector(probesStr, ',', probes);
00083   if(probes.size() != numProbes) {
00084     Err::errAbort("Probeset: '" + name + "' on line: " + ToStr(lineNumber) + 
00085                   " expecting " + ToStr(numProbes) + " probes got " + ToStr(probes.size()));
00086   }
00087   if(probes.size() % numMatch != 0) {
00088     Err::errAbort("Probeset: '" + name + "' on line: " + ToStr(lineNumber) + " must have an integral number * numMatch count of probes.");
00089   }
00090   // Subtract 1 of probes as we us R type 1 based index externally
00091   for(int pIx = 0; pIx < probes.size(); pIx++) {
00092     if(probes[pIx] != ProbeList::null_probe) {
00093       probes[pIx]--;
00094     }
00095   }
00096  
00097   ProbeSet *ps = new ProbeSet();
00098   ps->name = Util::cloneString(name.c_str());
00099   ps->psType = (ProbeSet::ProbeSetType)type;
00100   ps->numGroups = numBlocks;
00101   ps->atomsPerGroup.resize(numBlocks, 0);
00102   bool hasMM = numMatch == 2;
00103   int pmCount = numProbes / numMatch;
00104   ps->atoms.resize(numBlocks); // make an atom for each block...
00105   int currentProbeStart = 0;
00106   for(int atomIx = 0; atomIx < ps->atoms.size(); atomIx++) {
00107     Atom *a = new Atom();
00108     ps->atoms[atomIx] = a;
00109     int notNullCount = 0;
00110     int atomProbeEnd = blockSizes[atomIx] + currentProbeStart;
00111     for(int i = currentProbeStart; i < atomProbeEnd; i++) {
00112       if(i >= probes.size()) {
00113         Err::errAbort("Trying to read probe index " + ToStr(i) + " when max is: " + ToStr(probes.size() - 1) + " in probeset " + name);
00114       }
00115       if(probes[i] != ProbeList::null_probe) {
00116         notNullCount++;
00117       }
00118       if(hasMM && (i+pmCount >= probes.size())) {
00119         Err::errAbort("Trying to read probe index " + ToStr(i+pmCount) + " when max is: " + ToStr(probes.size() - 1)  + " in probeset " + name);
00120       }
00121       if(hasMM && probes[i+pmCount] != ProbeList::null_probe) {
00122         notNullCount++;
00123       }
00124     } 
00125     a->probes.resize(notNullCount);
00126     a->id = atomIx;
00127     ps->atomsPerGroup[atomIx] = 1; // can do this as there is just one atom per block.
00128     int probesInserted = 0;
00129     for(int i = currentProbeStart; i < atomProbeEnd; i++) {
00130       int probeIndex = i;
00131       int pId = probes[probeIndex];
00132       // regular pm-mm pair
00133       ///@todo I do not think we keep track of st vs at probes -- so we should really
00134       ///      have a Probe::PM and Probe::MM and set that here
00135       if(pId != ProbeList::null_probe && hasMM) {
00136         if(ProbeListFactory::maybeInsertProbe(a, probesInserted, pId, 0, Probe::PMST, pId))
00137           probesInserted++;
00138         int mmId = probes[i+pmCount];
00139         if(ProbeListFactory::maybeInsertProbe(a, probesInserted, mmId, 0, Probe::MMST, pId))
00140           probesInserted++;
00141       }
00142       else if(pId == ProbeList::null_probe && hasMM) {
00143         int mmId = probes[i+pmCount];
00144         if(ProbeListFactory::maybeInsertProbe(a, probesInserted, mmId, 0, Probe::MMST, pId))
00145           probesInserted++;
00146       }
00147       else if(pId != ProbeList::null_probe) {
00148         if(ProbeListFactory::maybeInsertProbe(a, probesInserted, pId, 0, Probe::PMST, pId))
00149           probesInserted++;
00150       }
00151       else {
00152         Err::errAbort("Null probe with no mismatch in probeset: " + ToStr(ps->name));
00153       }
00154       if(probesInserted > a->probes.size()) {
00155         Err::errAbort("ChipLayout::readProbeSetRecord() - " + ToStr(ps->name) + "More probes than space for.");
00156       }
00157     }   
00158     currentProbeStart += atomProbeEnd - currentProbeStart;
00159   }
00160   return ps;
00161 }
00162 
00163 
00164 ProbeSet * SpfReader::readNextProbeSet() {
00165   ProbeSet *ps = NULL;
00166   if(m_IncrementalIn.nextLevel(0) == TSV_OK) {
00167     ps = readProbeSetRecord(m_IncName, m_IncType, m_IncNumBlocks, m_IncBlockSizesStr, m_IncBlockAnnsStr, 
00168                             m_IncNumMatch, m_IncNumProbes, m_IncProbesStr, m_IncrementalIn.lineNumber());
00169   }
00170   return ps;
00171 }
00172 
00173 void SpfReader::openSpf(const std::string &fileName) {
00174   if(m_IncrementalIn.open(fileName) != TSV_OK)
00175     Err::errAbort("Couldn't open " + ToStr(fileName) + " to read.");
00176   m_IncrementalIn.bind(0, "name", &m_IncName, affx::TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00177   m_IncrementalIn.bind(0, "type", &m_IncType, affx::TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00178   m_IncrementalIn.bind(0, "num_blocks", &m_IncNumBlocks, affx::TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00179   m_IncrementalIn.bind(0, "block_sizes", &m_IncBlockSizesStr, affx::TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00180   m_IncrementalIn.bind(0, "block_annotations", &m_IncBlockAnnsStr, affx::TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00181   m_IncrementalIn.bind(0, "num_match", &m_IncNumMatch, affx::TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00182   m_IncrementalIn.bind(0, "num_probes", &m_IncNumProbes, affx::TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00183   m_IncrementalIn.bind(0, "probes", &m_IncProbesStr, affx::TSV_BIND_REQUIRED); 
00184 }
